name: Bitoomba
short_description:
Getting Started

Getting started playing at the Bitoomba Bitcoin casino is easy. Simply register an account (quick registration with minimal details) so you can immediately enjoy all of our games, once you are registered you can fund your account and choose any game you wish to play from our amazing selection of casino games.

Play Bitcoin Casino Games at Bitoomba! Welcome to Bitoomba! It’s time to enjoy the best Bitcoin casino games including Roulette, Slots, Blackjack, Baccarat, Dice, Video Poker, Bingo, Lottery, and even the SportsBook with more to come! Our players can register and enjoy a single wallet shared for all games as well as many more available games.

With up to 100% welcome bonus offered to new players as well as our fantastic ongoing promotions, our players can easily increase their bankroll and win big!
